snippet: Fashion week is well under way in London and one of the exciting highlights so far was Philip Treacy's Sunday show where the milliner was inspired, literally, by Michael Jackson's stage wardrobe.
abstract: Fashion week is well under way in London and one of the exciting highlights so far was Philip Treacy's Sunday show where the milliner was inspired, literally, by Michael Jackson's stage wardrobe.

headline.main: A Fashion Week Homage to Michael Jackson's Thriller
